S.FORM: babayuh (kamu nu Hulam: 毛毛蟲), sibanuhay a wawa nu adipapang atu pilaluhu' . sibanuhay a cilekay u babayuhan, u wawaay a cilekay nu sikinesay sisakubatay a kun-cong (adipapang atu pilaluhu' ). 有些蟲表面光滑,稱為dadipana', . anu kina cilekay idaw ku masaditay nu hekal nuheni, u dadipana' ciniza, anu kina cilekay idaw ku singawaay, idaw ku siangtulay a ngawaan. babayuhan idaw ku matatusaay nu tuluay a kuku'an nu ayawan, bili han atu kikul idaw ku matatusaay nu limaay a pacebaay nu kuku'an. makatukuh tunika sacilekaya han tulu tu kuliwan nu tatengay a ayaw nu kuku'an. babayu han idaw kumasa cilekaya nu wawaan a cilekayan-kayku, caay kalecad kuni kaudipan nuheni, kayku han si alilaylay cinida mala ti'kuk tabuen nida ku cilekay i labu, nina babayuhan inai kumahiniay a kawaan. "babayuh"和"dadipana'"並不相同. babayuh atu dadipana' cay kaw malecaday. nayi' ku banuh nu cilekay sipacebaay a mata atu bangcalay nu sikulitay, sapaceba tu mukanay a aadupan. sibunuhay nu cilekay nayi' ku pacebaay a mata. kakanen babayuh u langaw nu papah ku kanen nuheni, caaya kalecaday a babayuhan caay kalecad ku kan. idaw kumukanay tu si ledekay a langawan sapakay udipen nuheni ku ledek i labu nu udipang. sadikuday satu malasiledekay a adipapang atu wawa nu malacilekaya, pinay kiya ku mukanay tu cilekay a babayuhan. Katalawan nuheni sa u ayam atu puduh. katalawan atu hican mihaymaw kalakuwitan tu ku piusiwgacu nu malukay, ya "cing-ce" hananay u katukuhan tu nu adinsing a demiadan sikelekeleng tu ku tapuku tungusay a kapah tu ku nikalukan sananay kahini nu demiad, u celekay sa mulekal tu a musaungaay tahkal tu a mulatlat, i liwliway a cilekay sa katinengan tu kiyadahan ku kasadumaan nu demiaday, mademec ku iayaway a pinaabulad nu culal, ya pabesut sananay a micuyacuyay a dadipana' sa sikaydih a makay kilang a mulatlat sa, mapatawit ku miculilay nu tademaw namakadih, ya mamikuwanay tu aadupan nu Taypakay tungusay, u dadipana' sa u kuku ku sapikayakay, nika anu maydih a mulimad taydaen i masadumaay a kilang mulatlat atu mukan tu tuudtuud sa, matineng a mulpuwiy tu calay nu udip u sikaydih a pacukat tu kasaicelang, anu caay sa namapatawit kyu mulaliw a piedap tu calay nida mucuyacuy. ina dadipana' sa nau nu adipapang atu ya pilalihuay a cilekay ku sapangangan, katuud ku tademaw tu piadih tuya banuh atu kulit matalaw, sisa ya mamikuwanay tu aadupan nu Tayhuku tungusay, u kulit nu kahidaan nu dadipana' sa, u mamiading tu udip patalaw tu maydihay a mukan tu udip nida, haymaw saan a kaidawan tu nikasumadan,kaidawan nu dumaay a dadipana' katebingan nu mamicebisay sa mapacadici ku kapanaan malaliw a matalaw tu picucuk, caay sa yakulit nu udip niya dadipana' katalawan sa, u mahidaay u kaladamsayan ku wayway sa sasengien ku kulit nu udip, mahida u kulit nu papah sikaliyuhan u dadipana' kuydaan sa ku mimelaway, mahini sa u sipilaliw tu maydihay a mukan sapaading tu udip kanatatan nu lihat a maudip. (以上段落由Buting Nukay所翻譯.) (ipabaway a ulic ku nisulit ni Buting Nukay.) . anu mahetik ku babayuh i udip nu tademaw, hatidaay tu nu banuhan mahetik i banges numita maputun ku banuh nida i udip numita, ya banuh nida micumud ku ledek i banges numita, micumud satu ku banuh nu ledek i banges numita micidek kunika calenged atu adada, mahida unika tuduhan kunika adadaan. nuni kalatan ku banges numita idaw ku adidiay nu masakuulay, matenes kuni ka adada atu calenged. nikalatan nina nu "Furcula borealis" babayuhan caay kalecad ku kuu'l i bangesan, u sumanahay nu kuul han yadahay. . babayuhan yadah kunika liwasak a maudip, nu hatidaay i kilangan yadah ku adidiay nu babayuhan. anu isasa nu titican misasapi' kanca acaay ka walesaysa kasi ahebalay tu tupelan, atu sidikuc tu siledungay a tanayuan a dikucan, amana' kaisasa' nusi babayuhan nanay a titican a pahanhan. anu kahtikan ku udip nu babayu, amana tepai', hamawhan amibihbih mihetik, anu idaw ku banuh nu babayu i banges, hiyan tu tept amihuduc tu siledekay a banuhan. anu caay ka tepa' ku tept, kawida u takelalay nu tatipeluk. amana pikuskus atu mikaped, alaw macunus kunika calenge'dan, tahekal satu ku i bangesan nu mapatay a calenged, kalamkam amulahat, mapatay nu calenge', anu micidek kunika sumanah micidek sa malababesian. anu mamin tu maala ku banuh, pasapayu hantu ku banges, kina pinaan a demiad a pasipasid tu sapayuan tu dimiad, hina pakulien tu pina a kulian, tusa a lalipayan mangaay tu. . anu micidek ku calenget nu adada, atu utiih nu udipan, atu micidek ku kuul nu banges, muka tu sakacaay ka calengt nu sapayuan, anu caay pakadungdung pataydan hantu i padekuan. anu udiih tu ku udip, akuti', adada ku tangah, adada ku bili sa, kalamkamen tu tayda i padekuan. (以上段落由Iing Habay所翻譯.) (ipabaway a ulic ku nisulit ni Iing Habay.) masakiketay nu dadipana' :Pieris rapae,英文俗名:Small White, Small Cabbage White,別名:紋白蝶, . langdaway hananay a dadipana' sa, sanu salengacay masabihunayay a adipapang (ngangan nu ulic sa; Pieris rapae, nu Ing-guay nipangangan sa: Small White, Small Cabbage White, nu dumaay a ngangan sa unpay a adipapang, nu Dipunay a salengacay a adipapang, salengacay a adipapang, atu ya lamiay salengacay a adipapang). i hekal nu Taywanay sa nu Hulamena kenis singangan aca tu ya cay-hun hananay a adipapang, u masa nu hunay a adipapanay a sapamata. kalaliwasakan i nu O-ya a tukutukusan a buluku, itawya tu a micumud ikaamisan nu amuhiwan, atu i kaamisan nu Africa, Australia, New Zealand akanatal i makasasaay nu kakitidaan mulatlat. "cilekay". i kamu nu Sakizaya, u "cilekay" saan. 以上青蟲段落由Buting Nukay所翻譯. siwkay nu babayuh u babayuhh sa, u wawa nu adipapang. tanaya' ku kidu, siceka i kidu. yadah ku kulit, matalaw ku tademaw atu aadupan maazih. siwalak ku ceka' nu babayuh, anu maceka' sa tu banges, malebawa tu ku banges nu misu. sisa matalaw ku tademaw tu babayuh. babalaki tu ku babayuh sa, mala adipapang tu. bangcal ku adipapang, la'cus ku babayuh. mibabayuh mibabayuh 抓毛毛蟲/ mibabayuh ci Benel i kilakilangan. sibabayuh sibabayuh 有毛毛蟲/ sibabayuh i nu ayawan a kilang. sibabayuhay sibabayuhay 有毛毛蟲的/ sibabayuhay ku laku ni Bunuk. u sulit nu Amilika Caterpillars /'kætərˌpɪlər/ are the larval stage of members of the order Lepidoptera (the insect order comprising butterflies and moths). As with most common names, the application of the word is arbitrary and the larvae of sawflies commonly are called caterpillars as well. Caterpillars of most species are herbivorous, but not all; some are insectivorous, even cannibalistic. Some feed on other animal products; for example clothes moths feed on wool, and horn moths feed on the hooves and horns of dead ungulates. Caterpillars as a rule are voracious feeders and many of them are among the most serious of agricultural pests. In fact many moth species are best known in their caterpillar stages because of the damage they cause to fruits and other agricultural produce, whereas the moths are obscure and do no direct harm. Conversely, various species of caterpillar are valued as sources of silk, as human or animal food, or for biological control of pest plants.

babayoh (kamo no Holam: 毛毛蟲), sibanohay a wawa no adipapang ato pilaloho' . sibanohay a cilekay o babayohan, o wawaay a cilekay no sikinesay sisakobatay a kon-cong (adipapang ato pilaloho' ). 有些蟲表面光滑,稱為dadipana', . ano kina cilekay idaw ko masaditay no hekal noheni, o dadipana' ciniza, ano kina cilekay idaw ko singawaay, idaw ko siangtolay a ngawaan. babayohan idaw ko matatosaay no toloay a koko'an no ayawan, bili han ato kikol idaw ko matatosaay no limaay a pacebaay no koko'an. makatokoh tonika sacilekaya han tolo to koliwan no tatengay a ayaw no koko'an. babayo han idaw komasa cilekaya no wawaan a cilekayan-kayko, caay kalecad koni kaodipan noheni, kayko han si alilaylay cinida mala ti'kok taboen nida ko cilekay i labo, nina babayohan inai komahiniay a kawaan. "babayoh"和"dadipana'"並不相同. babayoh ato dadipana' cay kaw malecaday. nayi' ko banoh no cilekay sipacebaay a mata ato bangcalay no sikolitay, sapaceba to mokanay a aadopan. sibonohay no cilekay nayi' ko pacebaay a mata. kakanen babayoh o langaw no papah ko kanen noheni, caaya kalecaday a babayohan caay kalecad ko kan. idaw komokanay to si ledekay a langawan sapakay odipen noheni ko ledek i labo no odipang. sadikoday sato malasiledekay a adipapang ato wawa no malacilekaya, pinay kiya ko mokanay to cilekay a babayohan. Katalawan noheni sa o ayam ato podoh. katalawan ato hican mihaymaw kalakowitan to ko piosiwgaco no malokay, ya "cing-ce" hananay o katokohan to no adinsing a demiadan sikelekeleng to ko tapoko tongosay a kapah to ko nikalokan sananay kahini no demiad, o celekay sa molekal to a mosaongaay tahkal to a molatlat, i liwliway a cilekay sa katinengan to kiyadahan ko kasadomaan no demiaday, mademec ko iayaway a pinaabolad no colal, ya pabesot sananay a micoyacoyay a dadipana' sa sikaydih a makay kilang a molatlat sa, mapatawit ko micolilay no tademaw namakadih, ya mamikowanay to aadopan no Taypakay tongosay, o dadipana' sa o koko ko sapikayakay, nika ano maydih a molimad taydaen i masadomaay a kilang molatlat ato mokan to toodtood sa, matineng a molpowiy to calay no odip o sikaydih a pacokat to kasaicelang, ano caay sa namapatawit kyo molaliw a piedap to calay nida mocoyacoy. ina dadipana' sa nao no adipapang ato ya pilalihoay a cilekay ko sapangangan, katood ko tademaw to piadih toya banoh ato kolit matalaw, sisa ya mamikowanay to aadopan no Tayhoko tongosay, o kolit no kahidaan no dadipana' sa, o mamiading to odip patalaw to maydihay a mokan to odip nida, haymaw saan a kaidawan to nikasomadan,kaidawan no domaay a dadipana' katebingan no mamicebisay sa mapacadici ko kapanaan malaliw a matalaw to picocok, caay sa yakolit no odip niya dadipana' katalawan sa, o mahidaay o kaladamsayan ko wayway sa sasengien ko kolit no odip, mahida o kolit no papah sikaliyohan o dadipana' koydaan sa ko mimelaway, mahini sa o sipilaliw to maydihay a mokan sapaading to odip kanatatan no lihat a maodip. (以上段落由Boting Nokay所翻譯.) (ipabaway a olic ko nisolit ni Boting Nokay.) . ano mahetik ko babayoh i odip no tademaw, hatidaay to no banohan mahetik i banges nomita mapoton ko banoh nida i odip nomita, ya banoh nida micomod ko ledek i banges nomita, micomod sato ko banoh no ledek i banges nomita micidek konika calenged ato adada, mahida onika todohan konika adadaan. noni kalatan ko banges nomita idaw ko adidiay no masakoolay, matenes koni ka adada ato calenged. nikalatan nina no "Forcola borealis" babayohan caay kalecad ko koo'l i bangesan, o somanahay no kool han yadahay. . babayohan yadah konika liwasak a maodip, no hatidaay i kilangan yadah ko adidiay no babayohan. ano isasa no titican misasapi' kanca acaay ka walesaysa kasi ahebalay to topelan, ato sidikoc to siledongay a tanayoan a dikocan, amana' kaisasa' nosi babayohan nanay a titican a pahanhan. ano kahtikan ko odip no babayo, amana tepai', hamawhan amibihbih mihetik, ano idaw ko banoh no babayo i banges, hiyan to tept amihodoc to siledekay a banohan. ano caay ka tepa' ko tept, kawida o takelalay no tatipelok. amana pikoskos ato mikaped, alaw maconos konika calenge'dan, tahekal sato ko i bangesan no mapatay a calenged, kalamkam amolahat, mapatay no calenge', ano micidek konika somanah micidek sa malababesian. ano mamin to maala ko banoh, pasapayo hanto ko banges, kina pinaan a demiad a pasipasid to sapayoan to dimiad, hina pakolien to pina a kolian, tosa a lalipayan mangaay to. . ano micidek ko calenget no adada, ato otiih no odipan, ato micidek ko kool no banges, moka to sakacaay ka calengt no sapayoan, ano caay pakadongdong pataydan hanto i padekoan. ano odiih to ko odip, akoti', adada ko tangah, adada ko bili sa, kalamkamen to tayda i padekoan. (以上段落由Iing Habay所翻譯.) (ipabaway a olic ko nisolit ni Iing Habay.) masakiketay no dadipana' :Pieris rapae,英文俗名:Small White, Small Cabbage White,別名:紋白蝶, . langdaway hananay a dadipana' sa, sano salengacay masabihonayay a adipapang (ngangan no olic sa; Pieris rapae, no Ing-goay nipangangan sa: Small White, Small Cabbage White, no domaay a ngangan sa onpay a adipapang, no Diponay a salengacay a adipapang, salengacay a adipapang, ato ya lamiay salengacay a adipapang). i hekal no Taywanay sa no Holamena kenis singangan aca to ya cay-hon hananay a adipapang, o masa no honay a adipapanay a sapamata. kalaliwasakan i no O-ya a tokotokosan a boloko, itawya to a micomod ikaamisan no amohiwan, ato i kaamisan no Africa, Aostralia, New Zealand akanatal i makasasaay no kakitidaan molatlat. "cilekay". i kamo no Sakizaya, o "cilekay" saan. 以上青蟲段落由Boting Nokay所翻譯. siwkay no babayoh o babayohh sa, o wawa no adipapang. tanaya' ko kido, siceka i kido. yadah ko kolit, matalaw ko tademaw ato aadopan maazih. siwalak ko ceka' no babayoh, ano maceka' sa to banges, malebawa to ko banges no miso. sisa matalaw ko tademaw to babayoh. babalaki to ko babayoh sa, mala adipapang to. bangcal ko adipapang, la'cos ko babayoh. mibabayoh mibabayoh 抓毛毛蟲/ mibabayoh ci Benel i kilakilangan. sibabayoh sibabayoh 有毛毛蟲/ sibabayoh i no ayawan a kilang. sibabayohay sibabayohay 有毛毛蟲的/ sibabayohay ko lako ni Bonok. o solit no Amilika Caterpillars /'kætərˌpɪlər/ are the larval stage of members of the order Lepidoptera (the insect order comprising botterflies and moths). As with most common names, the application of the word is arbitrary and the larvae of sawflies commonly are called caterpillars as well. Caterpillars of most species are herbivoroos, bot not all; some are insectivoroos, even cannibalistic. Some feed on other animal prodocts; for example clothes moths feed on wool, and horn moths feed on the hooves and horns of dead ongolates. Caterpillars as a role are voracioos feeders and many of them are among the most serioos of agricoltoral pests. In fact many moth species are best known in their caterpillar stages becaose of the damage they caose to froits and other agricoltoral prodoce, whereas the moths are obscore and do no direct harm. Conversely, varioos species of caterpillar are valoed as soorces of silk, as homan or animal food, or for biological control of pest plants.
